SEPTEMBER 29, 1877.]

NEWCASTLE-ON-TYNE.
September 12. Hekla @ Bjorneborg,—3,927 pcs. deals and battens, J. Graham & Co.
September 13. Nil.
September 14. Nil.
September 15. Nil.
September 17. Mentor @ Gothenburg,—4,502 pcs. deals and battens, W. Southern & Son. D. A. Preston @ Pensacola,—885 pcs. pine timber, 389 pcs. deals, J. Carr, jun. & Co. Carl @ Uddevalla,—3,817 pcs. pit props, Pyman, Bell, & Co.
September 18. Hugin @ Gothenburg,—[quantity] deals, battens, pit props, and staves, Order.
September 19. Maria @ Gothenburg,—42,969 pcs. pit props, P. Hardy Bros. Zenobia @ Stockholm,—2,140 battens, 991 pcs. timber, T. Bell & Co. Annie @ Langror,—2,352 pcs. deals, 2,696 pcs. battens, Carr & Son. Wendla @ Stettin,—12,250 pcs. boards, A. Hood & Co. Samson @ Sundswall,—4,136 pcs. mining timber and pit props, Order.
September 20. Helena @ Gothenburg,—3,553 pcs. deals and battens, J. Graham & Co. Carl Johan @ Laurvig,—2,352 pcs. deals, battens, and staves, Order. Tjelwar @ Kattegat,—25,232 pcs. headings, Pyman, Bell & Co. Rika @ Uddevalla,—5,182 pcs. deals and deals, battens, and staves, Hall Bros. Tjelwar @ Kattegat,—1,352 pcs. balks, 381 pcs. planks, Order. Rika @ Uddevalla,—9,587 pcs. deals, 65 pcs. deals; 5,742 pcs. props, Camilla @ Drontheim,—3,528 pcs. battens, Order. Rose @ Gothenburg,—6,605 pcs. battens, Order. Wendla @ Sundswall,—2,888 pcs. mining timber and pit props, P. Osbeck.
September 21. Auguste @ Memel,—44 deals, 276 pcs. lathwood, W. Southern & Son. Castilia @ Pensacola,—14,595 pcs. props, Hall Brothers. Rudolph @ Nyvik,—deals and battens, Order. Cecilie @ Uleaborg,—Curry, Carrs, & Co. Domingo @ Porsgrund,—battens, G. Herring. Camilla @ Drontheim,—4,139 deals, V. Sheppard. Rose @ Gothenburg,—43,119 tens, Order. Marens @ Sundswall,—6,605 pcs. Bell, & Co. Augusta @ Halmstad,—5,534 pcs. battens, Order.
September 22. Augusta @ Gothenburg,—244 pcs. timber, 3,553 pcs. deals, 1,090 pcs. battens, J. Graham & Co. Carl Johan @ Laurvig,—5,967 pcs. deals, J. Graham & Co. Maria @ Gefle,—5,967 pcs. deals, J. Graham & Co. Maria @ Memel,—3,528 pcs. battens, Pyman, Bell, & Co. Wendla @ Sundswall,—1,865 pcs. mining timber and pit props, P. Osbeck.
September 24. Flora @ Miramichi,—35,230 deals, battens, &c., Grace Andrews @ Point Smith & Co. Saga @ Tatmagouche,—781 pcs. deals and ends, 5 fms. lathwood, Jones & Nash. Island,—13,205 deals, 134 ends, 413 pcs. hardwood, 1,500 palings, G. M. Barnes & King. 12 ends lathwood, T. Williams. Richibucto,—17,050 deals, scantlings, and ends, Taylor & Low Bros. Topdal @ Miramichi,—18,639 deals, scantlings, and ends, Emblin & Jones. Helen Finlayson @ Wyborg,—10,674 deals, battens, boards, and ends, Robinson, Son, & Co. Dunrobin @ Chatham, N.B.,—37,837 deals, battens, &c., 19,000 palings, G. M. Barnes & King. Richibucto,—27,589 deals and ends, 4,860 palings, G. M. Barnes & King. Freeman @ Dennis,—30,579 deals, &c., Jones & Nash. Racer @ Wyburg,—18,273 deals, &c., Emblin & Jones. Aphrodite @ Richibucto, —21,168 deals, &c., G. M. Barnes & King. Ophir @ Wyburg,—13,835 deals, &c., Taylor & Low Bros. Calypso @ New York,—12,794 deals, &c., Jones & Nash. Glenmorag @ New York,—44,610 flooring boards, May & Hassell. Grace Andrews @ Point Smith & Co. Hermann @ Sundswall,—19,704 deals, 1,588 scantlings, 2,583 deal ends, 2,225 boards, 925 palings, May & Hass U. Wayfarer @ St. John, N.B.,—12,794 deals, &c., Jones & Nash. Waldemar @ St. Petersburg and Wyburg,—28,500 deals, &c., 5,459 pcs. lathwood, Jones & Nash. Artos (s) @ Cronstadt,—28,500 deals, &c., 5,459 pcs. lathwood, Jones & Nash. Thor @ Cronstadt, 12,480 battens, &c., Jones & Nash. Abraham Lincoln @ Cronstadt,—13,819 deals, &c., Taylor & Low Bros. Amy @ Cronstadt,—8,190 battens, &c., Jones & Nash. Marie @ Cronstadt,—41,715 pcs. deals, &c., 1,556 ends, Robinson, Son, & Co. Nordstjernen @ Shediac,—11,428 deals, &c., 906 pcs. lathwood, G. M. Barnes & King. Jette @ Bjorneborg,—10,820 deals, &c., 173 pcs. square timber, Jones & Nash.

THE TIMBER TRADES JOURNAL.
SUNDERLAND.—Sept 13th to 26th.
Lumley (s) @ Bordeaux via London—12,588 pit props, T. J. Reay.
Alecto @ Christiansand—5,685 pit props, Pyman, Bell, & Co. Mathilda @ Altona—10,089 sleepers, 912 pit props, F. C. Huntley. Celsus (s) @ Sundswall,—13,175 pit props, Order. Astley @ Sundswall,—14,605 pit props, English and Swedish Timber Co. Fylls @ Christiansand,—3,142 sleepers. Ellen @ Holmstadt,—18,151 timber and pit props, Calder Bros. Vigilan @ Riga,—5,500 half sleepers, 8,261 round sleepers, 850 round sleepers, Augusta @ Nyvick, lant @ Holmstadt,—14,605 pit props, English and Swedish Timber Co. Harma @ Helsingfors,—30,566 pit props, Order. Thomas T. Elliot & Son. —10,602 deals and boards, 64 fms. firewood, Robert @ Hernosand,—deals and battens, Rayner & Moller. Regnhild @ Laurvig,—30,960 sleepers, Rayner & Moller. Figeholm—6,200 pit props, Rayner & Moller. Harmonia @ Christiania,—9,748 pit props, Rayner & Moller. Leucothea @ sand,—3,490 pcs. pit props and mining timber, Postulant @ Porsgrund,— Selma @ Uddewalla, 20,100 pit props, Rayner & Moller. Stettin,—265 pcs. oak, Taylor, Potts, & Co. Peacock Bros. Sardinian —5,750 sleepers, 5,815 boards. August Blanche @ Riga,—16,533 sleepers, 2,242 pcs. mining timber, poles, and pit props, Elgeworth @ Riga @ Soon,—20,200 pit props. Elgeworth @ Riga. Miyapko @ Nyvic,—17,046 firwood sleepers. Mimer,—2,706 props. Petter @ Hernosand—1,517 pcs. mining timber, V. Sheppard.
September 20. Helene @ Holmstrand,—4,083 pcs. battens, W. Southern & Son. Condor @ Memel,—247 pcs. fir timber, 1,698 pcs. deals, 6 fathoms lathwood, Rennoldson & Co. Petter @ Stockholm, Christiansand,—70,000 pcs. staves, Order. Carl @ Wisby,—449 pcs. sleepers, 195,440 pcs. sleepers, 198 pcs. headings, Tjelwar @ Kattegat,—8,232 pcs. deals, battens, and boards, Hardy Bros. Tjelwar @ Kattegat,—121,328 pcs. staves, Hall Bros. Tjelwar @ Kattegat,—4,502 pcs. planks, Order. thammarsvik,—16,343 pcs. sleepers, Order. Rika @ Uddevalla,—9,587 pcs. Valdemar @ Laurvig,—27,336 pcs. pit props, Order. Ebenezer @ Memei,—7,017 pcs. deals; 65 pcs. lathwood, Order. Harvest Queen @ Memei,—7,017 pcs. deals, 65 pcs. lathwood, Order. Celeste Henri @ Memei,—7,017 pcs. deals, 65 pcs. lathwood, Order. timber, Borries, Craig, & Co. Aravna @ Halmstad,—5,534 pcs. pit props, J. Atkinson & Son. Louisa Carolina @ Halmstad,—5,534 pcs. battens, Order. Stadt @ Christiania,—2,888 pcs. mining timber, J. Atkinson & Son.
September 21. Auguste @ Memel,—44 deals, 276 pcs. lathwood, W. Southern & Son. Castilia @ Pensacola,—14,595 pcs. props, Hall Brothers. Rudolph @ Nyvik,—deals and battens, Order. Cecilie @ Uleaborg,—Curry, Carrs, & Co. Domingo @ Porsgrund,—battens, G. Herring. Pyman, Bell, & Co. pcs. poles, 745 pcs. props, Camilla @ Drontheim,—4,139 deals, V. Sheppard. Rose @ Gothenburg,—43,119 tens, Order. Marens @ Sundswall,—6,605 pcs. Bell, & Co. @ Sundswall,—4,136 pcs. mining timber and boards, V. Sheppard.
September 22. Augusta @ Halmstad,—162 pcs. pit props, Order. Goteburg—3,080 props. Mary Ann @ Stettin,—248 pcs. firwood sleepers. Pride @ Danzig,—13,089 timber ends, Order. Petter @ Hernosand—1,002 pcs. fir timber, Order. Omer Pasha @ Stettin,—254 pcs. square timber, 1,034 pit props. Caledon @ Stettin,—28,257 pit props, Rayner & Moller. Clara @ Stettin,—246 pcs. boards, Order.
BARROW-IN-FURNESS.
September 12. Vasa @ Lulea,—4,286 pieces fir timber, hewn, W. Gradwell.
September 14. Der Wanderer @ Helsingfors,—18,047 deals, 1,491 pieces fir timber, hewn; Walker, & Co.
September 15. Equator @ Sundswall,—2,675 pieces fir, hewn; 1,225 deals, battens, and ends fir, sawn; 16,115 boards fir, sawn, F. J. Crossfield.
September 19. Elise @ Riga,—26,002 pieces lathwood fir, split, F. J. Crossfield.
September 20. Minerva @ Skelleftea,—deals, ends, and boards fir, sawn; 1 dozen spars fir, hewn; 1 dozen handspikes fir, hewn, The Master. G. B. Doane @ Miramichi,—31,723 deals, scantlings and ends fir, sawn, Price, Potter, Walker, & Co.
September 24. Recovery @ Dalhousie,—24,544 deals, battens, and ends fir, sawn, Pierce, Davies, & Walker, & Co.
September 25. Jenny @ Sundswall,—2,635 pieces fir, sawn, 1,934 deals fir, sawn, Pierce, Davies, & Charles.

189
NEWPORT.—September 11th to 25th.
May Queen (s) @ Bordeaux,—662 loads pit props, Ebbw Vale. Marie @ Hennebont,—150 loads pit props, J. Vipond & Co. Oscar Morgan @ Gothenburg,—490 loads pit props, J. Vipond & Co. Henri @ Hennebont,—100 loads pit props, Vipond & Co. Emilienne @ Hennebont,—100 loads pit props, Order. Jeune Felix @ Hennebont,—93 loads pit props, Order. Eugenie @ Hennebont,—256 pcs. deals, Order. Jeune & Heard. Wilhelma @ Drammen,—65 loads pit props, Order. Bee @ St. Malo,—pit props, Order. Marie @ Redon,—70 loads France @ Quimper,—100 loads pit props, Jones, Heard, & Co. Adrusten @ Bordeaux,—440 loads pit props, Order. Joseph @ Landerneau,—145 loads pit props, Order. La Plata @ Shediac,—14,011 deals Concorde @ Lorient,—80 loads pit props, Order. Amanda @ Princeport @ St. John, 10,000 palings, Order. St. Louis (s) @ Archangel,—6,944 deals, ends, and ends, 158 scantlings, 229 pcs. flooring, Sutherland & Co. —33,765 deals and ends, 4,544 scantlings, Order. Père Samson @ Hennebont,—168 loads pit props, Order. St. Louis (s) @ Lorient,—125 loads pit props, G. W. Jones. Ann Marie @ Pont l'Aboé,—46 loads pit props, Order. Angele @ Bordeaux, 1,200 sleepers, J. R. W. Jones & Co. Marie @ Imbro @ Riga,—605 loads pit wood, Jones, Heard, & Co. Isodore @ Lorient,—80 loads pitwood, Order. Corine Aimée @ Hennebont,—100 loads pitwood, Order. Prospero Neretto @ Bordeaux,—450 loads pitwood, Order. Fidele @ Bordeaux,—530 loads pitwood, Bonne Julienne @ Lorient,—607 loads pitwood, Jones, Heard, & Co. Farewell @ Stettin,—120 loads pitwood, Jones, J. Bland & Co. Pencee @ Henne-half oak blocks, 171 oak blocks, J. Bland & Co. Granfos @ Gothenburg,—3,826 ends, 40,124 palings, Order. Henri @ St. John,—508 deals and battens, 360 scantlings, 3,826 ends, 40,124 palings, Order. Beaconsfield @ Quebec,—142 pcs. oak and white pine, 2,617 half oak blocks, 171 oak blocks, 121 pcs. red logs, 10 pcs. elm, 6 pcs. birch, 121 pcs. red deals, 750 pipe staves, 3,200 W.I. staves, Batchelor & Co.
SOUTHAMPTON.—Sept. 12th to 25th.
Moselle (s) @ West Indies,—20 crotchets mahogany, 5 pkgs., Order.
Eos @ Sundswall,—42,951 deals and boards, Allen & Son. Berdinkha @ Riga,—5,390 deals and ends, J. B. Oswald. Neptus @ Gothenburg,—4,668 deals and battens, Driver & Co.
